short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple plugin to add presentation mode to chrome. This will force chrome into full screen mode and hide tabs and the address bar.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome presentation mode is back. Simply install this plugin to have quick access to a fullscreen window that removes all browser elements including the address bar and all tabs.
